text:
="preserve">Sálvio Dino (5 June 1932 – 24 August 2020) was a Brazilian writer and politician. He was born in Grajaú, Maranhão. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 1963 to 1964 and again from 1974 to 1979. He was Mayor of João Lisboa between 1989 to 1993 and again from 1997 to 2001.
Dino died of COVID-19 on 24 August 2020 at a hospital in São Luís, Maranhão, aged 88.
